# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(str, text_width = 10)
    lines = split(str, "\n")
    new_lines = []
    for line in lines
        if length(line) > text_width
            # 截取超过长度的部分并存入新数组
            words = split(line, ' ')[1:end-1]
            push!(new_lines, join(words, " "))
            push!(new_lines, "") # 在末尾添加一个空行，用于换行
        else
            # 当前行长度小于等于限制，直接加入新数组
            push!(new_lines, line)
        end
    end
    return join(new_lines, "\n")
end

# 示例使用
julia> wrap_string("Hello World This is a very long sentence that should be wrapped.")
"Hello World\nThis is a very long sentence that should be wrapped."
```
